text: Michael Phelps summoned up one of the great swims of his life to beat Ryan Lochte in the final of the 200m individual medley. It was the 20th Olympic medal of his career.
The swim started slow for Phelps and Lochte, the fastest swimmer was Takakuwa with 0.590s reaction time
Butterfly, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
Backstroke, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
Breaststroke, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
Dominating the race from the start, Phelps held off a final showdown from Lochte on the freestyle leg to claim his sixteenth gold and twentieth career medal in 1:54.27
Takakuwa starts with the fastest reaction time
After the first 50 metres butterfly Phelps has already taken the lead
Pereira is the second fastest swimmer after 100mt, running for the silver medal
After 150 metre the order is Phelp 1st, Pereira 2nd and Lochte 3rd
